info.title: GeoDataSource Location Search
info.description: GeoDataSourceâ„¢ Web Service is a REST API enable user to lookup for a city by using latitude and longitude coordinate. It will return the result in either JSON or XML containing the information of country, region, city, latitude and longitude, currency code, currency name, currency symbol, time of sunrise, time of sunset, time zone and distance of input coordinate with the city.. Visit https://www.geodatasource.com/web-service for further information.
